alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 9:58PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and central Scott Counties through 1030 PM CST... At 958 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oliver, or 8 miles west of Waldron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Cardiff... Winfield... Hon... Elm Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County
